file_content.text: You are no longer able to access this datacron.
You have located a datacron, an ancient technology once used by the Infinite Empire that can improve your natural attributes.
This datacron was created for a singular purpose: to improve one's Presence Attribute.
This one is still active; use it to improve your Presence Attribute. Once used, you will no longer be able to access its power.
You can feel the increased power coursing through your body. Perhaps there are more to be found....
